Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") RunService = game:GetService("RunService") UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
InputCheck = Instance.new("ScreenGui") InputCheck.Name = "InputCheck" InputButton = Instance.new("Frame") InputButton.Name = "InputMonitor" InputButton.BackgroundTransparency = 1 InputButton.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0) InputButton.Parent = InputCheck
Animations = {}
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
Rate = (1 / 60)
ToolEquipped = false
function SetAnimation(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(value.Animation) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = value.Animation, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play(value.FadeTime, value.Weight, value.Speed) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == value.Animation then v.AnimationTrack:Stop(value.FadeTime) table.remove(Animations, i) end end end end
function KeyPressed(Key, Down) InvokeServer("KeyPressed", {Key = Key, Down = Down}) end
function MouseClick(Down) InvokeServer("MouseClick", {Down = Down}) end
function CheckIfAlive() return (((Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0 and Player and Player.Parent) and true) or false) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") ToolEquipped = true if not CheckIfAlive() then return end PlayerMouse = Mouse PlayerMouse.Button1Down:connect(function() MouseClick(true) end) PlayerMouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseClick(false) end) PlayerMouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) KeyPressed(Key, true) end) PlayerMouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) KeyPressed(Key, false) end) local PlayerGui = Player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") if PlayerGui then if UserInputService.TouchEnabled then InputCheckClone = InputCheck:Clone() InputCheckClone.InputMonitor.InputBegan:connect(function() MouseClick(true) end) InputCheckClone.InputMonitor.InputEnded:connect(function() MouseClick(false) end) InputCheckClone.Parent = PlayerGui end end end
function Unequipped() if InputCheckClone and InputCheckClone.Parent then InputCheckClone:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end Animations = {} ToolEquipped = false end
function InvokeServer(mode, value) local ServerReturn pcall(function() ServerReturn = ServerControl:InvokeServer(mode, value) end) return ServerReturn end
function OnClientInvoke(mode, value) if mode == "PlayAnimation" and value and ToolEquipped and Humanoid then SetAnimation("PlayAnimation", value) elseif mode == "StopAnimation" and value then SetAnimation("StopAnimation", value) elseif mode == "PlaySound" and value then value:Play() elseif mode == "StopSound" and value then value:Stop() elseif mode == "MouseData" then return ((PlayerMouse and {Position = PlayerMouse.Hit.p, Target = PlayerMouse.Target}) or nil) elseif mode == "SetCamera" then local Properties = value.Properties local Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera for i, v in pairs(Properties) do pcall(function() Camera[i] = v end) end elseif mode == "SetTargetFilter" then local Object = value.Object PlayerMouse.TargetFilter = Object end end
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = OnClientInvoke Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local function Create_PrivImpl(objectType) if type(objectType) ~= 'string' then error("Argument of Create must be a string", 2) end --return the proxy function that gives us the nice Create'string'{data} syntax --The first function call is a function call using Lua's single-string-argument syntax --The second function call is using Lua's single-table-argument syntax --Both can be chained together for the nice effect. return function(dat) --default to nothing, to handle the no argument given case dat = dat or {}
--make the object to mutate local obj = Instance.new(objectType) local parent = nil
--stored constructor function to be called after other initialization local ctor = nil
for k, v in pairs(dat) do --add property if type(k) == 'string' then if k == 'Parent' then -- Parent should always be set last, setting the Parent of a new object -- immediately makes performance worse for all subsequent property updates. parent = v else obj[k] = v end
--add child elseif type(k) == 'number' then if type(v) ~= 'userdata' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Numeric keys must be paired with children, got a: "..type(v), 2) end v.Parent = obj
--event connect elseif type(k) == 'table' and k.__eventname then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create.E\'"..k.__eventname.."\']` must have a function value\ got: "..tostring(v), 2) end obj[k.__eventname]:connect(v)
--define constructor function elseif k == t.Create then if type(v) ~= 'function' then error("Bad entry in Create body: Key `[Create]` should be paired with a constructor function, \ got: "..tostring(v), 2) elseif ctor then --ctor already exists, only one allowed error("Bad entry in Create body: Only one constructor function is allowed", 2) end ctor = v
else error("Bad entry ("..tostring(k).." => "..tostring(v)..") in Create body", 2) end end
--apply constructor function if it exists if ctor then ctor(obj) end
if parent then obj.Parent = parent end
--return the completed object return obj end end
--now, create the functor: Create = setmetatable({}, {__call = function(tb, ...) return Create_PrivImpl(...) end})
--and create the "Event.E" syntax stub. Really it's just a stub to construct a table which our Create --function can recognize as special. Create.E = function(eventName) return {__eventname = eventName} end
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover") Fire = script:WaitForChild("Fire")
BasePart = Create("Part"){ Shape = Enum.PartType.Block, Material = Enum.Material.Plastic, TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth, FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom, Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2), CanCollide = true, Locked = true, Anchored = false, }
BaseBalloon = BasePart:Clone() BaseBalloon.Name = "HotAirBalloon" BaseBalloon.Elasticity = 0 BaseBalloon.Friction = 0 BaseBalloon.Size = Vector3.new(1.5, 2.25, 1.5) BallonMesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ Name = "Mesh", MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh, MeshId = (BaseUrl .. "409314310"), TextureId = (BaseUrl .. "409314207"), Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), VertexColor = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = BaseBalloon, } FirePart = BasePart:Clone() FirePart.Name = "Effect" FirePart.Transparency = 1 FirePart.CanCollide = false Create("Weld"){ Name = "Weld", Part0 = BaseBalloon, Part1 = FirePart, C0 = CFrame.new(0, -0.65, 0), C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = FirePart, } FirePart.Parent = BaseBalloon FireParticle = Fire:Clone() --FireParticle.Parent = FirePart
Flying = false FlyingEnabled = true
Gravity = 196.20
Rate = (1 / 60) ReloadTime = 5
ToolEquipped = false
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ServerControl", Parent = Tool, })
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Create("RemoteFunction"){ Name = "ClientControl", Parent = Tool, })
Handle.Transparency = 0 Tool.Enabled = true
function ResetBalloon() if Balloon and Balloon.Parent then Balloon:Destroy() end if CheckIfAlive() then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Spawn(function() InvokeClient("SetCamera", {Properties = {CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom, CameraSubject = Humanoid}}) end) end Flying = false FlyingEnabled = false Tool.Enabled = false wait(ReloadTime) --Handle.CanCollide = true --Handle.Transparency = 0 FlyingEnabled = true Tool.Enabled = true end
function MakeBalloon()
if not ToolEquipped or not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() or (Balloon and Balloon.Parent) or not FlyingEnabled then return end FlyingEnabled = false
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Balloon = BaseBalloon:Clone()
local Mass = (Balloon:GetMass() * Gravity)
BodyGyro = Create("BodyGyro"){ Name = "BodyGyro", D = 500, P = 3000, maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, 0, math.huge), Parent = Balloon, }
BodyVelocity = Create("BodyVelocity"){ Name = "BodyVelocity", P = 1250, maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, (Mass * 100), Mass), velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0), Parent = Balloon, }
BodyAngularVelocity = Create("BodyAngularVelocity"){ P = 1250, maxTorque = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass), angularvelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0.5, 0), Parent = Balloon, }
local RemoverCopy = Remover:Clone() local Values = { {Name = "Creator", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Player}, {Name = "Tool", Class = "ObjectValue", Value = Tool}, } for i, v in pairs(Values) do local Value = Create(v.Class){ Name = v.Name, Value = v.Value, Parent = RemoverCopy, } end RemoverCopy.Disabled = false RemoverCopy.Parent = Balloon --Handle.Transparency = 1 --Handle.CanCollide = false --local BalloonFire = Balloon.Effect.Fire Balloon.CFrame = (Handle.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 2, -(((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (Balloon.Size.Z / 2)) + 2))) Balloon.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Spawn(function() InvokeClient("SetTargetFilter", {Object = Balloon}) InvokeClient("SetCamera", {Properties = {CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Follow, CameraSubject = Balloon}}) end) while ToolEquipped and CheckIfAlive() and Balloon and Balloon.Parent do --BalloonFire.Enabled = Flying if Flying then Spawn(function() local MouseData = InvokeClient("MouseData") if MouseData and MouseData.Position and ToolEquipped and Balloon and Balloon.Parent then local MousePosition = MouseData.Position local Speed = 8 local Direction = CFrame.new(Balloon.Position, MousePosition).lookVector local Velocity = (Direction * Speed) BodyVelocity.velocity = Velocity end end) else BodyVelocity.velocity = (BodyVelocity.velocity * 0.98) if BodyVelocity.velocity.Magnitude < 0.35 then BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end end wait(Rate) end ResetBalloon() end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not CheckIfAlive() then return end MakeBalloon() end
function CheckIfAlive() return (Player and Player.Parent and Character and Character.Parent and Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent and Humanoid.Health > 0) end
function Equipped() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not CheckIfAlive() then return end ToolEquipped = true end
function Unequipped() ToolEquipped = false ResetBalloon() end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) local ClientReturn = nil pcall(function() ClientReturn = ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) return ClientReturn end
function OnServerInvoke(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or not Mode then return end if Mode == "MouseClick" then local Down = Value.Down if not Balloon or not Balloon.Parent then if Value.Down then Activated() end else Flying = Value.Down end end end
for i, v in pairs(Tool:GetChildren()) do if (v:IsA("BasePart") or v:IsA("Model")) and v ~= Handle then v:Destroy() end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = OnServerInvoke
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Model = script.Parent
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
FixCamera = script:WaitForChild("FixCamera")
Creator = script:FindFirstChild("Creator") Tool = script:FindFirstChild("Tool")
function DestroyModel() if Creator and Creator.Parent then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false if Character and Character.Parent then FixCameraClone.Parent = Character else local Backpack = Creator:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then FixCameraClone.Parent = Backpack end end end Debris:AddItem(Model, 2) end
if not Creator or not Creator.Value or not Creator.Value:IsA("Player") or not Creator.Value.Parent or not Tool or not Tool.Value or not Tool.Value.Parent then DestroyModel() return end
Creator = Creator.Value Tool = Tool.Value
Character = Creator.Character if not Character then DestroyModel() return end
Creator.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Creator.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" and not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end)
Tool.Changed:connect(function(Property) if Property == "Parent" then DestroyModel() end end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
function DestroyScript() Debris:AddItem(script, 2) end
Camera.CameraType = Enum.CameraType.Custom
Player = (((script.Parent:IsA("Model") and Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(script.Parent)) or (script.Parent:IsA("Backpack") and script.Parent.Parent)) or nil) if Player then Character = Player.Character if Character then Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid then Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid end end end
DestroyScript()

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
